actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Armed Services.

official_title: A bill to provide that the sons and daughters of recipients of the Distinguished Service Cross, the Navy Cross, or the Air Force Cross may be admitted to the service academies on the same basis as sons and daughters of recipients of the Congressional Medal of Honor.

summary.text: Provides that the sons and daughters of recipients of the Distinguished Service Cross, the Navy Cross, or the Air Force Cross may be admitted to the service academies on the same basis as sons and daughters of recipients of the Congressional Medal of Honor.

titles.title: A bill to provide that the sons and daughters of recipients of the Distinguished Service Cross, the Navy Cross, or the Air Force Cross may be admitted to the service academies on the same basis as sons and daughters of recipients of the Congressional Medal of Honor.
